title: Renovate or Relocate?
description: Housing prices have skyrocketed since the pandemic, but so have construction costs. Join Brandi Snowden, part of the Survey Research and Communications group at the National Association of Realtors, as well as agent Frank DeValdivielso of the Keyes Company/Luxury Portfolio International in South Florida, for a discussion with Mansion Global reporters Virginia K. Smith and Leslie Hendrickson.
